glyph.name: Loving Redirection
glyph.description: Sometimes love requires interrupting harmful patterns with grace. This practice teaches us to redirect dissonant energy toward more coherent patterns without violence or judgment.
glyph.practice: Notice when a conversation or dynamic becomes harmful or stuck. Pause and center yourself with one conscious breath. Hold compassion for everyone involved in the pattern before speaking.

interpretation:
A swift current tumbles sharp stones together.
The river slows, widening into a sunlit, glassy pool.
Water flows clear above the settled stones.
visualPhrases: A swift current tumbles sharp stones together.
The river slows, widening into a sunlit, glassy pool.
Water flows clear above the settled stones.
